whatHams: How Hams.AI Will Enhances Your Business Efficiency?
OUR_MISSION_text: Help companies build full stack ‘voice agents’ to answer phone calls without human interaction
sub-title-banner: #1 AI Voice Agent in MENA supports Arabic dialects
ONE-STOP-SHOP: Turn voice data into insights with our leading Speech AI models.
Description-hjz: Our voice AI platform offers tools to convert speech into text, text into voice, and understand Arabic conversations. From handling customer service calls to automating follow-ups, Hams.AI helps your business create seamless, efficient voice interactions, saving time and enhancing customer support
click-to-speaking: Click the mic to start the call
Feature-Description-01: Hams.AI leader in Speech Arabic Language in the industry with the most accurate models in the market across use case categories.
Feature-Description-02: Our GPU infrastructure optimizes speech and language models for superior, cost-effective performance.
Feature-Description-03: More than 60% of customers leave because of waiting in line, keep them now and increase your revenue
UseCaseTitle: B2B AGENTS: USE CASES AND SOLUTIONS
Solutions-work-Description-04: Boost your conversions by automating lead engagement. Hams.AI instantly calls back prospects, qualifies leads, schedules appointments, and nurtures potential clients, so your sales team can focus on closing deals.
Solutions-work-Description-05: Hams.AI provides consistent, patient, and efficient support for every customer, 24/7. No more long hold times or inconsistent service—our voice agents ensure that each customer receives the help they need, anytime.
Solutions-work-Description-06: Every interaction is an opportunity to learn. Hams.AI transcribes and analyzes conversations to reveal customer preferences, trends, and key insights, enabling smarter, data-driven decisions that elevate business strategies.
Solutions-work-Description-07: Streamline your operations with Hams.AI. From automating routine data collection to coordinating communications across departments, Hams.AI improves overall efficiency, freeing your team to work on what truly matters.
Solutions-work-Description-08: Use Hams.AI to enhance existing services, launch new product lines, or even build a startup entirely powered by voice agents. Our platform offers the flexibility you need to innovate and scale with confidence.
Solutions-work-Description-09: Hams.AI adapts to your audience with robust multilingual capabilities, specializing in Arabic language support across Saudi and GCC dialects. Reach diverse customer bases seamlessly, ensuring a personalized experience for every region.
What-work-Description-04: Automate routine tasks to lower labor costs and increase operational efficiency
What-work-Description-05: Train Hams.AI once, and it’s always ready to work—no days off, no overtime, just consistent support around the clock!
What-work-Description-06: Build AI voice agents in minutes without the need for AI specialists
How-work-Description-01: Fast and super accurate Arabic speech recognition, with advanced features to make your transcripts more readable and usable by humans and machines
How-work-Description-03: Audio Intelligence like no other. Identify, analyze, and summarize conversational audio with efficient, task-specific language models built for enterprise scale
FAQ-Title-01: What are the use cases for Hams.AI?
FAQ-Description-01: You can use one of our solutions, called 'Hams Call' in various sectors such as Healthcare and Customer Support. This solution transforms customer service with voice bots that can handle inquiries and solve problems 24/7 without human intervention, enhancing efficiency, user experience and reduce cost.
FAQ-Title-02: What makes your Voice AI solutions stand out?
FAQ-Description-02: Our Voice AI solutions are highly customizable, support multiple languages and espically in Arabic language with offer exceptional accuracy. They are designed to integrate seamlessly with existing systems, enhancing user experience without disrupting established workflows.
FAQ-Title-03: Are you based in Saudi Arabia?
FAQ-Description-03: Yes, we're based on Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
Subscribee-Now: Unlock voice AI at scale with an API Call
request-text-successful: Thank you, Hams.ai team will contact you soon.
request-text-invalid: Please, Make sure you filled all the fields
word-box: We offer unbeatable value and unparalleled performance. Try the first and best models for converting text to speech and speech to text in Arabic!
know-more-title: by companies across every use case

HighOperationalCosts.title: High Operational Costs
HighOperationalCosts.description: Traditional call centers rely heavily on human staff to manage customer interactions, resulting in significant operational expenses.

TimeSavings.title: Time Savings
TimeSavings.description: Existing situations suffer from long response times, impacting user satisfaction.

InefficientDataUtilization.title: Inefficient Data Utilization
InefficientDataUtilization.description: Businesses struggle to extract and leverage insights from unstructured audio data due to technological limitations.

LongDevelopmentTime.title: Long Development Time
LongDevelopmentTime.description: Deploying and training Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), Speech-to-Text, and Text-to-Speech models is a complex and challenging process.

LocalExecutionRequirement.title: Local Execution Requirement
LocalExecutionRequirement.description: Critical need for voice AI systems to operate effectively within local infrastructures to ensure optimal performance and compliance.

EconomicImpactOfMissedCalls.title: Economic Impact of Missed Calls
EconomicImpactOfMissedCalls.description: Inadequate voice AI solutions lead to significant business losses, with missed calls costing around $75B annually.

steps.title: Tell Hams your use case
steps.description: Sales? Customer Support? Operations? Or creating a product on top of us? We can do it all. Just start by telling Hams voice agent how to act.

steps.title: Pick any voice or language
steps.description: Pick or clone any voice. Choose your language, we will send or receive phone calls however you want, with emotion.

steps.title: Teach it like an employee
steps.description: Make a pathway to handle any conversation just like a human. With our guardrails, it can respond to anything intelligently. Without hallucination.

steps.title: Easily integrate your tools
steps.description: Want to automatically transfer to a human? Book a meeting? Send AI texts? Update a CRM? Simply drop your preferred tool into Hams, and we’ll handle the integration seamlessly.

itemSlider.title: Receptionist
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Nora, a Gym Receptionist. I use an AI-powered phone agent to answer customer questions 24/7 in a natural Saudi dialect. Call me and see if I sound like a human!

itemSlider.title: Customer Service
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Ahmed, your Customer Service Agent. I'm available 24/7 to answer your inquiries using AI technology. Feel free to call and experience our seamless service.

itemSlider.title: Appointment
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Sara, an AI Appointment Setter. I can help you schedule and remind you of appointments in no time, available 24/7 with a personal touch.

itemSlider.title: Survey
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Faisal, your Survey Assistant. I conduct quick and accurate surveys in a conversational Saudi dialect, powered by AI. Call me to provide your feedback!

itemSlider.title: Debt Collection
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Khalid, an AI Debt Collection Agent. I work around the clock to remind customers about their outstanding payments in a friendly tone. Contact me anytime!

itemSlider.title: Lead Qualification
itemSlider.prompt: Hi, I'm Layla, an AI Lead Qualifier. I can help you identify and qualify leads efficiently using AI technology. Let's connect and grow your business.

performance_rate_title: Setting a new performance rate in ASR
performance_rate_description: Hams.AI’s Speech-to-Text goes beyond just accuracy—it's built to adapt to real-world audio, delivering reliable transcriptions even in noisy environments. Test it with your data and experience how it enhances your workflow effortlessly.

unmatched_language_precision.title: Unmatched Language Precision
unmatched_language_precision.content: Our ASR models are finely tuned to capture the nuances of Arabic, Saudi dialects, offering unparalleled accuracy for GCC languages.

rapid_transcription.title: Rapid Transcription
rapid_transcription.content: With transcription speeds that process hours of audio in just minutes, Hams.AI sets a new benchmark for efficiency.

optimized_for_real_world_noises.title: Optimized for Real-World Noises
optimized_for_real_world_noises.content: Designed to perform exceptionally in noisy environments, ensuring reliable transcription in diverse settings like call centers and public spaces.
